#summary Installing Movico

= Requirements =

 * PHP 5.3 or higher
 * MySQL database

= Download =

You can download the latest Movico release [Downloads here].

= Installation =

Just unpack the zip file on your local system to start working with it. When you're ready developing, upload the contents to the web server.

= Configuration =

Check [BasicConfiguration this page] for instructions about the basic configuration of your package.
